id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_id = #{record.orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_type = #{record.orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_account_cashier_log set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_amount = #{changeAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, change_before = #{changeBefore,jdbcType=BIGINT}, balance_type = #{balanceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fee_item = #{feeItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_account_cashier_log
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT tacl.order_id,tacl.order_type,tacl.create_time FROM t_account_cashier_log tacl WHERE tacl.create_time BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY tacl.order_id

SELECT sum(change_amount) FROM t_account_cashier_log tacl WHERE tacl.create_time BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND tacl.fee_item=#{feeItem} AND org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and change_amount>0
SELECT sum(change_amount) FROM t_account_cashier_log tacl WHERE tacl.create_time BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} AND tacl.fee_item=#{feeItem} AND org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
